short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur your login details for added privacy on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maskerade automatically blurs your email or username on login pages, protecting your information from prying eyes. Perfect for shared or public spaces, Maskerade helps keep your login details discreet, reducing the risk of accidental exposure. 

Install now to add a layer of privacy to your login process with just one click!


***Why does the browser warn that Maskerade can "Read and change all your data on all websites"?***

This message is automatically generated by your browser to inform you about the permissions Maskerade requires to function. Maskerade needs these permissions to detect and blur your email or username on login pages.

Rest assured, Maskerade does not collect, store, or share any of your data. The extension only performs its intended function of enhancing your privacy.

For a detailed explanation of the permissions Maskerade uses, visit our documentation: https://github.com/burntsouup/Maskerade/blob/main/permissions.md


GitHub: https://github.com/burntsouup/Maskerade
Email: burntsouup@gmail.com
